 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֵּאָה‎</span><sub>86</sub> **noun feminine** ==corner, side== (***part cut off***, 'Abschnitt,' according to Schröter in [[BDB#Me|Mei]]<sup>Archiv. i. 461</sup> [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ZMG xii (1887), 615</sup> [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Lex</sup>, but perhaps biliteral, [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>M. 485</sup> [[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>§ 185, and not</sup> from √ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פאה‎</span>; compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***company***, etc. ([[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>l. e</sup>.); Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***pâtu, side, edge***</u></abbr>, ***border***, see especially [[BDB#Meissn|Meissn]]<sup>Suppl. 74</sup>; Late Hebrew = Biblical Hebrew, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פָּאתָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> [[Jer.9.25|Jer 9:25]] + 4 t.; construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּאַת‎</span> [[Amos.3.12|Amos 3:12]] + 77 t.; plural absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֵּאֹת‎</span> [[Exod.25.26|Exod 25:26]]; [[Exod.37.23|Exod 37:23]] dual construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּאֲַתֵי‎</span> [[Num.24.17|Num 24:17]] (but read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּאַת‎</span> as \|\| [[Jer.48.45|Jer 48:45]]); — 

**1.** ***corner*** of divan [[Amos.3.12|Amos 3:12]] table [[Exod.25.26|Exod 25:26]]; [[Exod.37.23|Exod 37:23]] field [[Lev.19.9|Lev 19:9]]; [[Lev.23.22|Lev 23:22]] ([[BDB#H|H]]); land (probably) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתַּחְלְקֵם לְפֵאָה‎</span> [[Neh.9.22|Neh 9:22]], i.e. into every corner; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ראֹשְׁכֶם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> [[Lev.19.27|Lev 19:27]] (i.e. ***your temples***), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זְקָנֶ֑ךָ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> v[[Lev.19.27|Lev 19:27]] compare [[Lev.21.5|Lev 21:5]] (all [[BDB#H|H]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֵאָה קְצוּצֵי‎</span> ***those clipped on the temples*** [[Jer.9.25|Jer 9:25]]; [[Jer.25.23|Jer 25:23]]; [[Jer.49.32|Jer 49:32]] (epithet of Arabian tribes, Herod.<sup>iii, 8</sup> [[BDB#WMM|WMM]]<sup>As.u.Eur.140 f.</sup> [[BDB#We|We]]<sup>Skizzen iii. 119</sup>; Heid. 2, 198); ***temples of Moab*** (under figure of man) [[Num.24.17|Num 24:17]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]) [[Jer.48.45|Jer 48:45]]. 

**2.** ***side:*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** usually of Ezekiel's temple, the tabernacle, the holy city and the land, or its subdivisions (only Ezek 41-48 [47 t.] and [[BDB#P|P]] [26 t.]): in plur. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּאַת קָדִ֫ימ(הׅ‎</span> ***East side*** [[Ezek.47.18|Ezek 47:18]] + 17 t. Ezekiel, = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֵדְמָה פ‎</span> [[Exod.27.13|Exod 27:13]] + 3 t. [[BDB#P|P]] and [[Ezek.45.7|Ezek 45:7]] (see [[BDB#Co|Co]] Toy); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָפ֫וֺנ(ה) פ‎</span> ***North side*** [[Ezek.47.15|Ezek 47:15]]; [[Exod.26.20|Exod 26:20]] + 9 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶגֶב‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ֶ נ֫גְבָּה) פ‎</span> ***South side*** [[Ezek.47.19|Ezek 47:19]] (twice in verse); [[Exod.27.9|Exod 27:9]] + 8 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(יָ֫מָּה) פ‎</span> ***West side*** [[Ezek.45.7|Ezek 45:7]]; [[Exod.27.12|Exod 27:12]] + 21 t. + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֶּרֶךְֿ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַיָּם פ‎</span> [[Ezek.41.12|Ezek 41:12]] (also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָדִים הַיָּם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> [[Ezek.48.1|Ezek 48:1]]); absolute only <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַפֵּאָה הָאֶחָת‎</span> [[Exod.27.9|Exod 27:9]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּאַת פָּנָיו‎</span> [[Lev.13.41|Lev 13:41]] ***side*** (border) ***of his face*** (forehead and temples; [[BDB#P|P]]). 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פאם‎</span> see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פימה‎</span>
